DataElement.preferredName: Disabilities of the Arm Shoulder and Hand Outcome Measure Work Module Total Score
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Numeric value representing the total score of the Work Module portion of the Disabilities of the Arm, Shoulder and Hand Outcome measure, a 30-item, self-reported questionnaire designed to measure physical and social function along with symptom impact associated with musculosketetal disorders of the upper limb.
